nsIDOMWindow sbIApplicationController::getActiveWindowOfType ( in AString  aWindowType  ) 

Get the current active window of specified type. Get the current active window of specified type, such as "main", "mini" or "browser".

Parameters:

sbIMediaList sbIApplicationController::getActiveMediaListInWindow ( in nsIDOMWindow  aWindow  ) 

Get the current active media list object in the specified window.

Parameters:
aWindow The window possibly containing a media list object.
Returns:
The active media list object, if present.
Return values:
null No active media list object in specified window.
